Okay. Uh, let's see. You probably need to hit control-alt-F1 to get to a console. Then run 'sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg'. Select the vesa driver (graphics acceleration will be disabled, but you can reconfigure it at your leisure once you know how). Then run 'sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart'
